Package org.openexchangerates.client

Interface Summary
RestClient.ConnectionInitializer Implementors can configure the http connection before every call is made.
RestClient.ConnectionProvider implement to provide an HttpURLConnection w/ some properties pre-set see BasicAuthenticationConnectionProvider for an example.
RestClient.ErrorHandler The ErrorHander does something based on an HTTP or I/O error.
RestClient.HttpGETCache A caching interface clients may set to enable caching of GETs.
RestClient.HttpGETCacheEntry Represents all information that should be cached by HttpGETCache implementation.
RestClient.Response<T> The response from the server for a given request.
RestClient.ResponseDeserializer<T>  
RestClient.URLBuilder Utility interface for building URLs from String segments.
 

Class Summary
BuildConfig  
OERClient openexchangerates.org (OER) client for Java.
R  
R.attr  
R.drawable  
R.layout  
R.string  
RestClient A client library for accessing resources via HTTP.
RestClient.Base64OutputStream  
RestClient.BasicAuthConnectionInitializer A Connection Initializer that sends Basic Authentication header in the request.
RestClient.FormFile Used to specify a file to upload in a multipart POST.
RestClient.FormInputStream Used to specify a file to upload in a multipart POST.
RestClient.HashMapCache Simple cache implementation using a HashMap backend.
RestClient.TimeoutConnectionInitializer A ConnectionIntializer for timeouts.
 

Enum Summary
RestClient.HttpMethod HTTP methods supported by REST client.
